<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Cockroach](/Monsters.aspx?ID=585)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Cockroaches are communal creatures, rarely setting out on their own unless they are searching for food. If an adventurer encounters a single giant cockroach while exploring, they had best take precautions against others, as there is likely an entire colony nearby.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16

</row>

**HP** 20

**Scurry** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The giant cockroach is targeted by a melee attack; **Effect** The giant cockroach gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack resolves, the cockroach Strides, [Climbs](/Actions.aspx?ID=138), or [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) up to 10 feet.

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

**Melee**

**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing
